resources.string: Type entry in here, then press Enter

Hello! Welcome to Media Roulette! This app is intended to help those who need to make a decision, but are plagued with too many options. Follow the directions below and your decision will be made!!!

1.) From Main Menu, click on Edit List
2.) Enter all entries one at a time by pressing Enter button. The text box below the buttons will populate your list.
 3.) Go back to the Main Menu and click on Start.
 4.) Give the wheel a spin, and there's your decision!
